leawind_third_person.text.title: Leawind's Third Person
leawind_third_person.option_category.cam: Adjust player position on the screen and other parameters. You don't need to manually adjust options on this page, as you can hold Z in the game and use the mouse to adjust.
leawind_third_person.option_category.smo: Smooth factors determine the smoothness of the smoothing effect. A smooth factor of 0 is equivalent to no smoothing, i.e., reaching the target value immediately. 1 is equivalent to infinite smoothness, i.e., never reaching the target value.
leawind_third_person.option_group.camera: Adjust the camera distance to the player with the scroll wheel when holding specific keys in third-person mode. Set the adjustment range here.
leawind_third_person.option_group.aiming: When aiming with bow, crossbow, spear, etc.
leawind_third_person.option_group.player: Make the player fade out in cramped spaces to avoid obstructing the view.
leawind_third_person.option.is_mod_enabl: Disabling will show the original third-person perspective but still allow opening the configuration screen with a key.
leawind_third_person.option.player_fade_: Not actually 'fading out,' just suddenly becoming invisible to avoid obstructing the view.
leawind_third_person.option.lock_camera_: Cannot pitch up or down when locked.
leawind_third_person.option.player_rotat: Force Player Rotation with Camera When Not Aiming
Force player view to parallel with the camera when not aiming.
leawind_third_person.option.rotate_to_mo: Automatically Rotate Player to Moving Direction
Automatically rotate the player toward the direction of movement.
leawind_third_person.option.render_cross: Display crosshair when in aiming mode.
Display crosshair when not in aiming mode.
leawind_third_person.option.available_di: Adjust the camera-to-player distance with the mouse scroll wheel. This option represents the number of distance levels.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_dista: Minimum camera-to-player distance when adjusting with the scroll wheel. Player entity becomes invisible at the minimum distance if this feature is enabled.
Maximum camera-to-player distance when adjusting with the scroll wheel.
leawind_third_person.option.distance_smo: Smooth factor for the change in distance between the camera and player when the player is stationary, changing to the target distance.
leawind_third_person.option.offset_cente: Press and hold a specific key to center. When centered, X offset is fixed at 0, and the player is in the center of the screen. This option adjusts the Y offset in this state.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_ray_t: When aiming at an object beyond this distance, player view will parallel the camera view.
leawind_third_person.option.turn_with_ca: Player Turns with Camera When Entering First Person
When entering first-person view, make the player face the same direction as the camera in the just-ended third-person view.
leawind_third_person.option.projectile_a: When aiming at a block or entity, automatically adjust the shooting angle to hit the target.
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_side: Toggle Camera to the Other Side
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_aiming: Short Press to Toggle Aiming State
